creators.name: The Miner Family
creators.notes: Couple UGC creators, trusted by 100+ brands. High-quality scroll-stopping content.

creators.name: Lindsay Mysior
creators.notes: Journaling/stationery creator. High-energy storytelling with nostalgic aesthetic. PERFECT for handwritten cards.

creators.name: Journaling Dan
creators.notes: Stationery influencer, pen pal enthusiast. Writes about snail mail. IDEAL niche match!

creators.name: Regina (Miami UGC)
creators.notes: Miami-based UGC creator. LOCAL TO COOP!

creators.name: Alina Antman
creators.notes: Lifestyle/Beauty/Fashion/Travel. Trusted by 900+ brands worldwide. NYC based.

creators.name: Austin and Lexi
creators.notes: 5.4M followers. Massive couple account. May be expensive but huge reach for brand awareness.

creators.name: Gracie
creators.notes: Active UGC creator actively looking for brand deals. Good entry point.

creators.name: Fox and Cactus
creators.notes: Stationery brand/creator. Stickers, washi tape, planners. Australia-based but great niche fit.

creators.name: Villa Beautifful
creators.notes: Pens, stickers, stationery for creative planners. Seattle-based. Perfect niche.

creators.name: Penpal Kat
creators.notes: Pen pal content creator. Makes videos about letter writing. IDEAL for Yours Truly!

notes: Focus on stationery/pen pal creators first - they're the perfect niche match for handwritten cards
